description: Defines classes for representing and managing a directory tree structure, including insertion of files with metadata and HTML generation for visualization.

classes.name: DirectoryNode
classes.description: Represents a node in the directory tree, which can be a file or directory, with associated metadata and children.

classes.name: DirectoryTree
classes.description: Manages the directory structure, supports inserting files with metadata, and generates HTML representation.

methods.name: insert_file
methods.description: Inserts a file into the directory tree, normalizing the path, creating nodes as needed, and updating metadata.

methods.name: generate_html
methods.description: Outputs an HTML representation of the directory tree.

methods.name: generate_html_node
methods.description: Recursively generates HTML for a node and its children, with sorting and formatting.
